title: Request for Body Cam Footage – Child Neglect Arrest in Doral, FL (June 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to the body camera footage from an incident that occurred in June 2024 in Doral, Florida, involving the arrest of a woman identified as Renteria for allegedly leaving her 3-year-old son unattended in a vacation rental while undergoing plastic surgery.

To assist in locating the footage, here are the details of the incident:

Date of Event: June 2024 (exact date unknown, but arrest occurred June 28, 2024)
Suspect: Renteria
Location: Vacation rental apartment complex in Doral, Florida
Incident: Child found wandering alone for six hours before officers responded and located the mother at a nearby surgery center
Charges: Child neglect

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to body camera footage and any additional records regarding incidents involving Marlena Velez, who was arrested for alleged theft at the Target store in Cape Coral, Florida, on October 30, 2024 and November 20, 2024. Specifically, I am seeking footage recorded by officers during or after the incidents where Marlena Velez was allegedly involved in shoplifting. According to reports, Velez, a TikTok influencer, was arrested for stealing merchandise, including $225 worth of goods during the second incident, following an earlier theft on October 30. In addition to the body cam footage, I am interested in any available surveillance video, arrest records, or other related documents that might help provide a comprehensive view of these incidents. To assist in locating the footage, here are the key details of the incidents: Date of Incident 1: October 30, 2024 Date of Incident 2: November 20, 2024 Name: Marlena Velez (suspect) Location of Incident: Target store, Cape Coral, Florida,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
